import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Layout from '../components/Layout/Layout'; const CartPage = () => { const [cartItems, setCartItems] = useState([ { id: 1, nombre: 'iPhone 15 Pro', marca: 'Apple', precio: 999.99, cantidad: 1, imagen: 'ðŸ“±', stock: 10, }, { id: 2, nombre: 'MacBook Pro 14"', marca: 'Apple', precio: 1999.99, cantidad: 1, imagen: 'ðŸ’»', stock: 5, }, { id: 3, nombre: 'AirPods Pro', marca: 'Apple', precio: 249.99, cantidad: 2, imagen: 'ðŸŽ§', stock: 20, }, ]); const updateQuantity = (id, newQuantity) => { if (newQuantity < 1) return; setCartItems(items => items.map(item => item.id === id ? { ...item, cantidad: Math.min(newQuantity, item.stock) } : item ) ); }; const removeItem = (id) => { setCartItems(items => items.filter(item => item.id !== id)); }; const subtotal = cartItems.reduce((sum, item) => sum + item.precio * item.cantidad, 0); const shipping = subtotal > 1000 ? 0 : 29.99; const tax = subtotal * 0.18; // 18% IGV const total = subtotal + shipping + tax; return (
